Stream A and B strike the black slanted barrier, merge and are deflected to the right.
Stream C impacts the yellow slanted barrier and turns right.
Stream D encounters no baffle and drops straight down.

premise: Stream D encounters no baffle and drops straight down.
conclusion: Stream D straddles the right angle of the grey baffle, then bifurcates into 2 streams.
